headline: Colgate-Palmolive Results Highlight Dividend Streak And Valuation Debate
summary: Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) reports strong fourth quarter results with broad based sales growth across all categories. The company extends its 63 year streak of annual dividend increases, reinforcing its record of consistent payouts. The update comes as many consumer categories experience sluggish overall market conditions. Colgate-Palmolive, the consumer products group behind oral care, personal care, home care and pet nutrition brands, is showing solid momentum at a time when many parts...
